Injury: Selected by the Vegas Golden Knights from the Dallas Stars in the NHL Expansion Draft.
Suspended by the NHL for 4 games.
Signed by the Dallas Stars to a four-year contract extension.
Re-signed as a restricted free agent by the Dallas Stars to a two-year contract.
Dallas Stars tendered a qualifying offer.
Signed by the Washington Capitals to a three-year entry-level contract.
Returned to his junior team (Swift Current-WHL).
